effect.sun_moon: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses. Inflicts regular damage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses. Inflicts regular damage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses. Inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
